com.collabnet.ccf.pi.sfee.v44
Class SFEEAppHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.collabnet.ccf.pi.sfee.v44.SFEEAppHandler

public class SFEEAppHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class works with the ISourceForgeSoap object for the source SFEE system to get the Comment Texts entered by the users for an artifact.

Author:
madhusuthanan (madhusuthanan@collab.net)

 void addComments(com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.webservices.tracker.ArtifactSoapDO artifact, java.util.Date lastModifiedDate, java.lang.String connectorUser)
          This method retrieves all the comments added to a particular artifact (represented by the ArtofactSoapDO) and adds all the comments that are added after the lastModifiedDate into the ArtifatSoapDO's flex fields with the field name as "Comment Text" [as this is the name displayed in the SFEE trackers for the Comments] It calls the private method addComments which can add comments for a list of artifacts by querying the ISourceForgeSoap object for this particular SFEE system.

Method Detail

addComments

public void addComments(com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.webservices.tracker.ArtifactSoapDO artifact,
                        java.util.Date lastModifiedDate,
                        java.lang.String connectorUser)
This method retrieves all the comments added to a particular artifact (represented by the ArtofactSoapDO) and adds all the comments that are added after the lastModifiedDate into the ArtifatSoapDO's flex fields with the field name as "Comment Text" [as this is the name displayed in the SFEE trackers for the Comments] It calls the private method addComments which can add comments for a list of artifacts by querying the ISourceForgeSoap object for this particular SFEE system. The comments added by the connector user are ignored by this method.

Parameters:
artifact - - The AritfactSoapDO object whose comments need to be added
lastModifiedDate - - The last read time of this tracker
connectorUser - - The username that is configured to log into the SFEE to retrieve the artifact data.

addComments

private void addComments(java.util.List<com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.webservices.tracker.ArtifactSoapDO> artifactHistory,
                         com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.webservices.tracker.ArtifactSoapDO artifact,
                         java.util.Date lastModifiedDate,
                         java.lang.String connectorUser)
